meanings.definition: A humorous or satirical drawing or comic strip.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching cartoons on Saturday mornings.
meanings.sent2: The newspaper always has funny cartoons in the comics section.
meanings.sent3: My little sister drew cartoons of our family with big noses and silly hats.
meanings.sent4: The artist's cartoons of politicians were sharp and witty.
meanings.sent5: The cartoons in the magazine made me laugh out loud.

meanings.definition: An animated film or television show.
meanings.sent1: My favorite cartoons are about talking animals.
meanings.sent2: Kids love to watch colorful cartoons with exciting adventures.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon characters went on a wild journey to find a magical treasure.
meanings.sent4: Watching cartoons is like stepping into a vibrant, animated world.
meanings.sent5: The new cartoon series has amazing animation and funny jokes.

meanings.definition: A simplified or exaggerated representation of something.
meanings.sent1: The safety manual had cartoons showing how to use the equipment.
meanings.sent2: The artist created cartoons of the city skyline with giant buildings.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon version of the map made it easy to understand the geography.
meanings.sent4: His cartoons of the animals made them look larger than life.
meanings.sent5: The exaggerated cartoons of the storm made it seem scarier than it was.
